archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.3.6b: b) Certificate Policies (CPs) for each type of digital certificate issued by the CA, which indicate the applicability of the certificates issued (e.g. for secure email or e-commerce transactions).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
